Posts.EditableText:
This time I do not have a problem but a feature request. Q5 supports hyperlinks. Is it possible to create hyperlinks in a textblock or a msg something like this ? 
msg("In the <lookat>bed</lookat> you can see a beautiful <talk>girl</talk> lying on a <take>pea</take>")
